list_definition.definition: (a) thick cord, made by twisting together lengths of hemp, nylon etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He tied it with a (piece of) rope

list_definition.definition: to tie or fasten with a rope

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He roped the suitcase to the roof of the car.

list_definition.definition: to catch with a rope; to lasso
